Package org.example.webappadmin.utils

Class ApiController

java.lang.Object
org.example.webappadmin.utils.ApiController
public class ApiController extends Object
Utility class for handling HTTP API requests with session management and error handling.
Author:
Juan Carlos

  • Method Details

    • makePostRequest

      public static String makePostRequest(String url, String jsonPayload, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session) throws Exception
      Makes a POST request to the specified URL with JSON payload and session management.
      Parameters:
      url - the target URL for the POST request
      jsonPayload - the JSON payload to send in the request body
      session - the HTTP session for maintaining cookies and authentication
      Returns:
      the response body as a string
      Throws:
      Exception - if there are network issues or server errors
